author: MacBoy__Pro

changelog.release_notes: 1.18 - Bug fix to allow display of weather
1.17 - Added the "%" sign to the battery percentage
Fixes the issue of the watch battery taking a long time to load
Fixes issue of N/A being dsiplayed when battery percentage is below 20%

Version 1.1.3 - Fixed an error where the app would crash when switching from watchface to watchface. 

Recent Versions: 
**Version 1.1.2** Made battery percentage a number instead of an image 
**Version 1.1.1** Fixed a UI glitch 
**Version 1.1** Added support for localized weather and battery percentage

description:
Basic Watchface with weather, date, time, and location displayed easily. If you have any suggestions or things I could do differently feel free to contact me with your ideas.

With my app on iPhone for the weather to update while the phone is locked you must make sure that Background app-refresh for the Pebble app is on and Location Services for the Pebble app is on.

latest_release.release_notes: 1.18 - Bug fix to allow display of weather

title: Pebble Drive
